#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Comfortably Sleep with a Dog in Your Bed
#Text=Sometimes you want your furry companion to share a sleep space but you get ca n't seem to really fit together and sleep comfortably .
#Text=Use these tips and you and your fuzzy pal will be cuddling comfortably all night long !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Make sure that your dog will sleep in your bed .
#Text=Some dogs do n't like to sleep with their owners and that 's perfectly fine .
#Text=If they do n't want then just let it go for a while and maybe try again later .
#Text=Make sure that you do n't force anything .
#Text=If your dog usually sleeps somewhere that that is not your bed
#Text=do n't be surprised if your dog jumps off and goes back there in the middle of the night .
#Text=Make sure that your dog can easily get up and down off your bed or you will get very tired very quickly of putting them up there every time .
#Text=Know that in the wild , dogs tend to find a place to sleep and call it 's den for a very long time so do n't be surprised if your dog wants to stay there .
#Text=If your dog is having trouble try moving their crate , pillow or whatever else they sleep on into your room for a while so they get used to sleeping in that room
#Text=Have a couple trial nights .
#Text=Have a couple of nights where you try to sleep with your dog to see some of the patterns the dogs do .
#Text=Do they like to sleep at the top of the bed ?
#Text=Do they move or bark a lot in their sleep ?
#Text=Do they tend to lick their paws or pant a lot before going to sleep ?
#Text=Make sure that you pick a pretty open week to do this where you do n't have to worry about being tired the next day if your dog kept you up all night .
#Text=Fix any patterns that you do n't like .
#Text=Now you need to fix any problem that you come across .
#Text=If your dog has a tendency to do something in bed that you do n't like now is the time to fix it .
#Text=If your dog tends to sleep somewhere that you find difficult to lay down comfortably
#Text=try moving them to your preferred spot before you go you sleep .
#Text=If they lick their paws a lot , pant , spin in circles , or something else like that before they go to sleep try to get into bed earlier so they can do that before you need to sleep .
#Text=And you are done !
#Text=Your fluffy friend and you should have no problem sleeping together .
#Text=hope you enjoyed this article
#Text=it is my first one .
#Text=I have slept with my two dogs for four years now so I have picked up a few tips over the years .
#Text=Thank You !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Having a nice big bed helps a lot .
#Text=I used to sleep with my two dogs on a twin sized mattress and it did n't really work .
#Text=But I 've since then gotten a queen and it is much better .
#Text=If your dog tends to be a blanket hogger get them another blanket that they can sleep on so you can have yours all to your self .
#Text=If your dog is keeping you up because they keep walking around and moving try taking them for a walk or playing fetch before bed to try to wear them out .
#Text=Do n't be afraid to move them if they are laying somewhere or doing something that you do n't like .
#Text=It does n't make them not love you any more or anything so just do it and get it over with and then you will be much more comfortable
